name: Daria Interview Tool
overview: An AI-powered research interviewing platform with text-to-speech and speech-to-text capabilities for conducting and analyzing user interviews.

timeline.event: Released RC2 with improved interview flow and LangChain integration
Created project journal system for continuity between sessions
Started database schema implementation for core tables
Began testing AWS deployment with simple components
Fixed Character Identity and Context Leakage issues in interview system
Updated system with Python 3.13 compatibility patch and integrated Memory Companion into startup/shutdown scripts
May 19, 2025: Update EC2 with new release candidate for testing, add elastic IP for testing remote interview
May 24, 2025: Add in Reach Front End

opportunities.title: Persistent Database for Interview Data
opportunities.description: Implement structured database to replace JSON file storage

opportunities.title: AWS Deployment Strategy
opportunities.description: Create deployment process for AWS with proper security and scaling

opportunities.title: Memory Companion Feature
opportunities.description: Implement Daria as project companion with persistent memory

opportunities.title: Sprint Engine Capabilities
opportunities.description: Add full agile artifact generation for UX research sprints

opportunities.title: Streamlined Service Management
opportunities.description: Use ./run_latest_with_patch.sh to start all services (including Memory Companion) and ./stop_daria_services.sh to stop everything cleanly

opportunities.title: Add TTS and STT to Daria Memory Companion
opportunities.description: We have the http://localhost:5030/static/daria_memory_companion.html where we can chat with Daria about the project milestones. Currently it is text only chat. It would be great to add TSS and STT to that tool.

conversation_history.user_message: ok remember that we have to give you access so you can see and talk about the issues in the issue tracker.
conversation_history.daria_response:
Got it! I'll remember that we need to give me access to the issue tracker so I can see and discuss the issues more effectively. Once that's set up, I can help you manage and track bugs, feature requests, and any other relevant details.

If there's anything else you'd like to address or work on in the meantime, just let me know!

conversation_history.user_message: Did you detect a restart of the Daria app?
conversation_history.daria_response:
I don't have the capability to detect application states or system events like a restart of the Daria app. My role is to assist with information and tasks related to the **Daria Interview Tool** project based on the details we've discussed.

If you restarted the app and are experiencing any issues or have questions about the current state, feel free to share, and I can help you troubleshoot or guide you through the next steps!

conversation_history.user_message: ok
conversation_history.daria_response: If you have any more questions or need assistance with anything else related to the **Daria Interview Tool** project, feel free to ask! I'm here to help!

conversation_history.user_message: can you write to your memory?
conversation_history.daria_response:
I can't directly write or modify my memory, but I can remember details during our conversation to maintain continuity. However, I won't retain those details once our session ends.

If there are specific things you'd like me to remember for our ongoing discussions, just let me know, and I can keep them in mind during our current session! For any permanent changes to project details or tasks, you'd need to document those separately.

conversation_history.user_message: ok We must fix that
conversation_history.daria_response:
Absolutely! Improving memory functionality would be beneficial for better continuity and context in our conversations. It would allow me to provide more relevant assistance and track project details more effectively.

If you have ideas on how you'd like that to work or if there's a specific approach you'd like to take to implement improvements, feel free to share! I'm here to help with whatever you need.

conversation_history.user_message: Hello! I've just booted up. Can you remind me what we're working on?
conversation_history.daria_response:
Hello! Welcome back! We're currently focused on the **Database Implementation and AWS Deployment (Phase 2)** sprint for the **Daria Interview Tool** project.

Here’s a brief overview of what we're working on:

- Finalizing the database feature, particularly migrating to a persistent database for interview data.
- Ensuring the proper configuration and security of the AWS deployment.
- Troubleshooting any issues related to the remote interview template and monitoring feature.

If there's something specific you'd like to dive into today or if you have any questions, just let me know!

conversation_history.user_message: you here
conversation_history.daria_response: Yes, I'm here! How can I assist you today? If you have any questions or need to discuss something about the **Daria Interview Tool** project, feel free to let me know!

conversation_history.user_message: I'm having issues whith adding upload transcript feature and wanted to check your helth
conversation_history.daria_response:
I'm here and ready to help! If you're facing issues with adding the upload transcript feature, let’s troubleshoot together. 

Could you provide more details about the specific problems you're encountering? For example, are there errors being thrown, or is it related to how the feature is integrated with the current system? The more information you share, the better I can assist you!
